Element.Description: BEAst: This document describes the BEAst profile, and how BEAst's order messages, version 3.1, for NeC, Rental and Material are linked to the Peppol structure. Peppol:
BEAst: T3309 and T0034, Order/Calloff number. Peppol:
BEAst: Not used by BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:
BEAst: T3310, order date. Peppol:
BEAst: T3310, order time. Peppol:

BEAst: Order Type (T3100). In this version "220" is the only option. The blanket order ("226") is not yet supported by Peppol, so when you mean "226", this element shall be omitted and when you mean "220", the code "220" shall be sent. Peppol:
BEAst: Not used by BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:
BEAst: T6018, Currency code. Peppol:
BEAst: T6005, Customer's Reference/Number. Peppol:
BEAst: T6004, Project number. Peppol:
BEAst: Not used by BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:
BEAst: T6010, Reference to the offer. Peppol:

BEAst: T6335, Reference to the customer's calloff/order. In the case a calloff/order is sent separately for material and service, the material calloff shall have a reference to the service calloff/order and vice versa. Peppol:
BEAst: T6221, Reference to the Ultimate customer's order number. Peppol:

BEAst: Contains the additional information that is defined by the DocumentType. Used for Package Label (T6368), Notification Channel (T6366), Notification Time (T6367), Notification Address (T6456), Offer GUID (T6485), Drawing number (T6222), Entry code (T6176), Period of validity start (T6400), Period of validity end (T6401), Vehicle attribute value (T6346), Instructions (T6393), Document name (T6484). Peppol:

BEAst: Used to specify the type of information sent in ID and in some cases a related code. The format is "BEAST:", followed by the identification about what data is sent, then a ":" followed by the related code. See the example. If no code is used the two last parts are omitted. "BEAST:PackageLabel", "BEAST:NotificationChannel", "BEAST:NotificationTime", "BEAST:NotificationAddress", "BEAST:OfferGUID", "BEAST:DrawingNumber", "BEAST:EntryCode", "BEAST:PeriodOfValidityStart", "BEAST:PeriodOfValidityEnd", "BEAST:VehicleAttribute:" plus the value of the code (T6345), "BEAST:Instructions" (T6393), Document type External (T6473). Peppol:
BEAst: Embedded Document Binary Object (T6475). Filename is linked to Embedded Document File Name (T6476). Peppol:
BEAst: Link to Related Document (T6187) or Instructions URL (T6392) depending on value in DocumentType. Peppol:
BEAst: Reference to Agreement or Contract (T0007). Peppol:
BEAst: T0008 or T6001, the identity of the buyer. Only one identification of the buyer will be used. Peppol:
BEAst: T5001, Name of the buyer. Peppol:
BEAst: T5003, Street name/number or Postbox number of the buyer. Peppol:
BEAst: Used for Department (T5002). Peppol:
BEAst: T5005, City name. Peppol:
BEAst: T6117, Postal zone. Peppol:
BEAst: Not used by BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:
BEAst: Used for any other additional address information to the buyer. Peppol:
BEAst: T5007, country code. Peppol:
BEAst: T0099, VAT identification number. Peppol:
BEAst: T5012, Contact person name. Peppol:
BEAst: T5010, Telephone number. Peppol:
BEAst: T5011, email address. Peppol:
BEAst: T0009 or T6001, Identification of the supplier. Only one identification of the seller will be used. Peppol:
BEAst: T5001, Name of the supplier. Peppol:
BEAst: T5003, Street name/number or Postbox of the supplier. Peppol:
BEAst: Used for Department (T5002). Peppol:
BEAst: T5005, City name. Peppol:
BEAst: T6117, Postal Zone. Peppol:
BEAst: Not used by BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:
BEAst: Used for all other additional address information. Peppol:
BEAst: T5007, Country code. Peppol:
BEAst: T5012, Contact name. Peppol:
BEAst: T5010, Telephone number. Peppol:
BEAst: T5011, email address. Peppol:

BEAst: This party is re-defined by BEAst to be the Ship-from Location. In BEAst version 3.1 both the Ship-from Location and the Originator Customer party are used. Between these two BEAst have prioritized the Ship-from Location. Peppol:
BEAst: T0129 or T6001, identification of the Ship-from Location. Only one of the identities will be used. Peppol:
BEAst: T5001 or T6324/T6325/T6424, Name or coordinates separated with "/". For coordinates use the format WGS84, degrees with decimals. Peppol:
BEAst: Not used by BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:
BEAst: Not used by BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:
BEAst: Not used by BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:
BEAst: T0085 or T6001, Identity of the Invoicee. Use only one identity on the partner. Peppol:
BEAst: T5001, Name of the Invoicee. Peppol:
BEAst: T5003, Street name/Number or Postal box of the Invoicee. Peppol:
BEAst: Used for Department (T5002). Peppol:
BEAst: T5005, City name. Peppol:
BEAst: T6117, Postal Zone. Peppol:
BEAst: Not used by BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:
BEAst: Used for all other additional address information. Peppol:
BEAst: T5007, Country code. Peppol:
BEAst: T6030, VAT Identification number. Peppol:
BEAst: T0036 or T6001, Identity of the Consignee. Only one Identity of the party will be used. Peppol:
BEAst: T5001, Name of the Consignee. Peppol:
BEAst: T5003, Street name/Number or Postal box number of the Consignee. Peppol:
BEAst: Used for Department (T5002). Peppol:
BEAst: T5005, City name. Peppol:
BEAst: T6117, Postal zone. Peppol:
BEAst: Not used by BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:
BEAst: Used for all other address information. Coordinates (T6321/T6322) are given in format WGS84, degrees with decimals, separated with a "/". Peppol:
BEAst: T5007, Country code. Peppol:
BEAst: The Requested Delivery Period should be set at line level, not here. Peppol:
BEAst: The Requested Delivery Period should be set at line level, not here. Peppol:
BEAst: T0037 or T6001, Identity of the Delivery party. Use only one identity of this party. Peppol:
BEAst: T5001, Name of the Delivery party. Peppol:
BEAst: T5003, Street name/Number or Postal box no of the Delivery party. Peppol:
BEAst: Used for Department (T5002). Peppol:
BEAst: T5005, City name. Peppol:
BEAst: T6117, Postal zone. Peppol:
BEAst: Not used by BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:
BEAst: Used for all other address information. Peppol:
BEAst: T5007, Country code. Peppol:
BEAst: T5012, Contact name. Peppol:
BEAst: T5010, Telephone number. Peppol:
BEAst: T5011, email address. Peppol:
BEAst: Not used in BEAst version 3.1. Always set to "NA".. Peppol:
BEAst: Shipping Marks Consignment (T0086). Peppol:
BEAst: Terms of Delivery NeB (T6710). Peppol:
BEAst: Transport Information (T6008) or Unloading Instructions (T6343). Peppol:
BEAst: Delivery Place Terms (T6020). Peppol:
BEAst: Not used by BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:
BEAst: Not used by BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:
BEAst: Not used by BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:
BEAst: Line Item Information (T6031). Peppol:
BEAst: Line number (T0051). Peppol:
BEAst: Ordered Quantity (T0039) and Measure Unit NeB Type (T6706). Peppol:
BEAst: Not used by BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:
BEAst: Indication that BackOrders are Permitted (T6724). BEAst value "160" is here "false" and "161" is here "true". The value "137" cannot in this version be used. Peppol:
BEAst: Project Number (T6004). Peppol:
BEAst: Delivery Period Start Date (T6319). In this version it is not possible to specify the time (T6734), only date. Peppol:
BEAst: Delivery Period End Date (T6320). In this version it is not possible to specify the time (T6735), only date. Peppol:
BEAst: Not used by BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:
BEAst: Only Allowances can be used with BEAst version 3.1, not Charges. Peppol:
BEAst: Special Service Description Code (T6719). Peppol:
BEAst: Special Service Description (T6111). Peppol:
BEAst: Percentage (T6228). Peppol:
BEAst: Amount NeB (T6230). Peppol:
BEAst: Base Amount (T6229). Peppol:
BEAst: Price Amount (T6235) and the Currency code (T6018). Peppol:
BEAst: Price Unit Basis Quantity (T6722). Peppol:
BEAst: Not used by BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:
BEAst: Product Information (T6037). Peppol:
BEAst: Article Description (T6226). Peppol:
BEAst: Buyer's Article Number (T6022 or T0172 when T6317 = "BP" or Littera (T6417)). Peppol:
BEAst: Supplier's Artcle Number (T0172 when T6317 = "SA"). Peppol:

BEAst: Global Trade Item number (T0154), GTIN for Consumer Unit (T6225), NOBB Article Number (T6027), RT Article Number (T6460), TUN Article Number (T6028), Finfo Vilma Article Number (T6029), RSK Article Number Norwegian (T6024), RSK Article Number Sweden (T6023), Enumber Norwegian (T6026), E number (T0260), SGTIN (T6461). Scheme ID describes which type of article number it is. Peppol:
BEAst: Drawing number (T6222). Peppol:

BEAst: Used for multiple BEAst elements: SBMI Number (T0172:01), S√Ö Number (T0172:02), Concrete Number (T0172:04), Number (T0172:07), Fuel Number (T0172:08), Configuration Value (T6369), GUID Identifier (T6408), BIM Model Name (T6433), GUID for BIM Identity (T6431), GUID for Object (T6455), Identity Type Code (T6440), Product Type GUID (T6441), Product Type Description (T6442), Customer Remarks (T6036), Customer Reference Number (T6005), Offer Number (T6010), Offer Line Number (T6459), Offer Line GUID (T6486), Ultimate Customer Order Number (T6221), Ultimate Customer Order Line Number (T6458), Shipping Marks Consignment (T0086), Rental Indicator (T6477), Expected time of return (T6479), Rental period Start date (T6312), Rental period End date (T6313) Rental time Quantity (T6478), Rental quantity code (T6425), Rental quantity Shift code (T6426), Excess (T6482), Reference to Article class (T6466), Source to Classification (T6467), Size per load (T6460), Delivery Interval; interval start (T6461), Delivery Interval; interval end (T6462), Delivery Interval; Calculated unloading time (T6463), Delivery Interval; Time for Unloading (T6464), Delivery Mark Instruction (T6002), Insurance (T6071). Peppol:

BEAst: ListID shall always be set to ZZZ and listVersionID to BEAST. Name identifies what the value is. The ItemClassificationCode itself contains the value of the element. Possible names are: SBMINumber, S√ÖNumber, ConcreteNumber, WasteNumber, FuelNumber, ConfigurationValue, GUIDIdentifier, BIMModelName, GUIDforBIMIdentity, GUIDforObject, IdentityTypeCode, ProductTyppeGUID, ProductTypeDescription, CustomerRemarks, CustomerReferenceNumber, OfferNumber, OfferLineNumber, OfferLineGUID, UltimateCustomerOrderNumber, UltimateCustomerOrderLineNumber, ShippingMarksConsignment, RentalIndicator, ExpectedTimeOfReturn, RentalPeriodStartDate, RentalPeriodEndDate, RentalTimeQuantity, RentalQuantityCode, RentalQuantityShiftCode, Excess, ReferenceToArticleClass, SourceToClassification, SizePerLoad, DeliveryInterval:IntervalStart, DeliveryInterval:IntervalEnd, DeliveryInterval:CalculatedUnloadingTime, DeliveryInterval:TimeForUnloading, DeliveryMarkInstruction, Insurance. Peppol:
BEAst: Not used by BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:

BEAst: Name of the property or Heading for the BEAst Label. When NameCode is BEAST:Destination 1-8, the name shall contain the corresponding heading (T6347, T6349, T6351, T6353, T6355, T6357, T6359, T6361). Otherwise it is T6469 or T6446. or . Peppol:

BEAst: .Identifies what the Name and Value contain. ListID is always BEAST. Possible values are: DeliveryUnit, Destination1, Destination2, Destination3, Destination4, Destination5, Destination6, Destination7, Destination8, UnloadingInstruction, ArticlePropertiesNeC + value in T0011, T6444+T6443(ListID). Peppol:

BEAst: The content is described by the NameCode. Can be the Delivery Unit (T6340), Destination Content 1-8 (T6348, T6350, T6352, T6354, T6356, T6358, T6360, T6362), Unloading Instruction (T6344), Article Property (T6470), T6452. Peppol:
BEAst: T6457 (Property Compare Code) + T6706 (Measure Unit NeB Type in unitCode). Peppol:
BEAst: T6450 (PropertyValueId). Peppol:
BEAst: T3236, (Serial Number). Peppol:
BEAst: Not used by BEAst version 3.1. Peppol:
